1578580.name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Goblin Camp Map Pack
1578580.description:
This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

FG Goblin Camp Map Pack

The Goblin Camp Map pack brings a multitude of new images for your map creations. Create endless camps and fortifications in a primitive style that can be used for goblins and any encounter that this style fits. TheGoblin Camp Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. These images have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new image tools.
This pack includes the following items:
  • A premade map created with these assets as a stand-alone image or a start to your own fortified encampment
  • Brushes of walls, stairs, ladders, wooden platforms, ropes, and more
  • Decorations that include tents, buildings, barricades, stone elements, drapery, and more
  • Effects of specialized shadows for some decorations to add an extra level of detail
  • Walls of stone in many shapes and sizes
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Joshua Watmough
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Requires Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
